SEARCH
Package org.dataaccess.repository

Interface IRepository<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of entity managed by the repository.
All Known Subinterfaces:
IDisciplineRepository, IRoomRepository, ISessionRepository, IStudentGroupRepository, IStudentRepository, ITeacherRepository, ITimeslotRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseRepository, DisciplineRepository, RoomRepository, SessionRepository, StudentGroupRepository, StudentRepository, TeacherRepository, TimeslotRepository
public interface IRepository<T>
An interface representing a generic repository for managing entity of type T.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    delete(T object)
    Deletes an entity from the repository.
    void
    deleteMany(List<T> objects)
    Deletes multiple entities from the repository.
    T
    getById(int id)
    Retrieves an entity by its ID.
    List<T>
    readAll()
    Retrieves all entity of type T from the repository.
    void
    save(T object)
    Saves an entity in the repository.
    boolean
    validate(T object)
    Validates an entity.

  • Method Details

    • getById

      T getById(int id)
      Retrieves an entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the entity to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The entity with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • save

      void save(T object) throws RepositoryOperationException
      Saves an entity in the repository.
      Parameters:
      object - The entity to save.
      Throws:
      RepositoryOperationException - If an error occurs during the repository operation.

    • delete

      void delete(T object) throws RepositoryOperationException
      Deletes an entity from the repository.
      Parameters:
      object - The entity to delete.
      Throws:
      RepositoryOperationException - If an error occurs during the repository operation.

    • deleteMany

      void deleteMany(List<T> objects) throws RepositoryOperationException
      Deletes multiple entities from the repository.
      Parameters:
      objects - The entities list to delete.
      Throws:
      RepositoryOperationException - If an error occurs during the repository operation.

    • readAll

      List<T> readAll()
      Retrieves all entity of type T from the repository.
      Returns:
      A list of all entity in the repository.

    • validate

      boolean validate(T object)
      Validates an entity.
      Parameters:
      object - The entity to validate.
      Returns:
      True if the entity passes validation, false otherwise.
